name: puripilot
description: PuriPilot smart-home floorplan designer with LG PuriCare device control

scripts.build: tsc --skipLibCheck --outFile dist/blueprint3d.js --target ES5 --module system --moduleResolution classic src/blueprint3d.ts src/core/*.ts src/floorplanner/*.ts src/items/*.ts src/model/*.ts src/three/*.ts && echo "module.exports = BP3D;" >> dist/blueprint3d.js && browserify dist/blueprint3d.js --standalone BP3D --outfile=example/js/blueprint3d.bundle.js --verbose && echo "if (typeof window !== 'undefined') window.BP3D = BP3D;" >> example/js/blueprint3d.bundle.js
